channel.title: [NOT SOLVED] Need help with no-ip/portforwarding please
channel.description:
So, first of all im still pretty new at runescape private servers and i need some help. *I have a source, and a client (317's) *Got them to work with hamachi *Everything runs fine
BUT i don't want it to be a hamachi server, so i looked into port forwarding my router, I port forwarded ports 43594 on both TCP and UDP and used a few different portcheckers to see if it opened, it did. I then registered for No-ip and downloaded it, made a host and edited that into my client where my hamachi ip was and compiled it. It wouldn't connect... Got a fresh client, tried the no-ip address i made from their website,and it wouldn't connect.
Did i miss a step? Can anyone help me?

item.title: [NOT SOLVED] Need help with no-ip/portforwarding please
item.dc:creator: @tetrent tetrent
item.description:
@tetrent wrote:

other computers wont connect to it

Read full topic

item.title: [NOT SOLVED] Need help with no-ip/portforwarding please
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

You only need to connect to localhost. Your players connect to no-ip

Read full topic

item.title: [NOT SOLVED] Need help with no-ip/portforwarding please
item.dc:creator: @tetrent tetrent
item.description:
@tetrent wrote:

So, first of all im still pretty new at runescape private servers and i need some help.
*I have a source, and a client (317’s)
*Got them to work with hamachi
*Everything runs fine

BUT i don’t want it to be a hamachi server, so i looked into port forwarding my router,
I port forwarded ports 43594 on both TCP and UDP and used a few different portcheckers to see if it opened, it did.
I then registered for No-ip and downloaded it, made a host and edited that into my client where my hamachi ip was and compiled it.
It wouldn’t connect…
Got a fresh client, tried the no-ip address i made from their website,and it wouldn’t connect.

Did i miss a step? Can anyone help me?

Read full topic
